```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(reprex)
library(xaringan)
library(pagedown)
library(xaringanthemer)
# folders
folders <- c("code", "data", "img", "pdfs")
purrr::map(.x = folders, .f = fs::dir_create)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, 
                      message = FALSE, 
                      fig.align = "center", 
                      dpi = 320, 
                      fig.height = 4, 
                      fig.path = "img/")
options(width = 60, 
        max.print = 60)
download.file(url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rstudio/hex-stickers/master/PNG/rmarkdown.png", destfile = "img/rmarkdown.png")
```

# Load the packages 

<br><br><br><br>

```{r packages, eval=FALSE}
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "inspectdf", 
                   "flexdashboard", "reactable")
library(tidyverse)
library(inspectdf)
library(flexdashboard)
library(reactable)
```

```{r pckgs, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(inspectdf)
library(flexdashboard)
library(reactable)
```
